title: Contact Us
description: Get in touch with us for admissions, inquiries, or any other information.
directions: The school is located in Sengani Village, easily accessible by road from Tala town. Vehicles and Motorbikes are available.

faqs.question: What is the admission process?
faqs.answer: Admissions are open from November to December each year. Please visit the school office with required documents, including a birth certificate, previous school records, and passport-size photographs.

faqs.question: Do you provide boarding facilities?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have excellent boarding facilities for students who come from distant places. The hostel provides a safe and nurturing environment with all necessary amenities.

faqs.question: What are the school timings?
faqs.answer: School hours are from 8:00 AM to 4:10 PM, Monday through Friday. Saturday classes are from 8:30 AM to 1:00 PM. Evening classes start at 7:00 PM and end at 8:00 PM. The Girls then are left to do their personal studies till 9:30pm, when they go to their dormitories

faqs.question: What extracurricular activities are available?
faqs.answer: We offer various clubs, including Science Club, Literary Club, Art Club, Music Club, and Community Service. Sports activities include basketball, volleyball, badminton, athletics, football, and rugby.
